_description: The wounds of love — one 5-line stanza

BodAsh191IV.First Lines:
Go hert hurt with aduersiteAnd let my lady þi wondis
                    see…
BodAsh191IV.Last Lines:
…fare wel my Ioy And wel come peynetyl y se my lady A
                    gayne
